forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 14 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
The evening air in Downtown San Francisco carries a coolness, softly kissed by the last light of day, inviting inhabitants to revel in the tender beauty of a partly cloudy night. As the sun prepares to retreat beyond the horizon, you can feel a gentle breeze whispering through the streets, a west-southwest wind brushing past at 14 to 24 mph, adding a playful lift to the evening atmosphere. With temperatures settling around 54 degrees, it is a comfortable night, although the cool air may require a light jacket to embrace the tranquility of the moment.

Today had a character steeped in sunshine, but as twilight envelops the city, any remaining warmth is tempered by the approach of a familiar marine layer. The foggy embrace of the Pacific may linger, but it is not overwhelming; rather, it lovingly drapes over parts of the coastline, offering a gentle reminder of the sea's proximity. With the current conditions inviting casual strolls, one might consider wandering the familiar pathways of the Embarcadero, taking in the sights and sounds, or perhaps sharing conversation over warm drinks in cozy cafes that exude the charm of the city. A soft knit sweater paired with comfortable shoes would be the perfect attire for immersing oneself in the gentle scenery of this beautiful evening.
